ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's® Hickory & Brown Sugar)
1 ½ tablespoons Asian-flavored barbeque seasoning (such as Savory Spice® Asian Delight BBQ Rub)

cookingTips: Mix sauce and seasonings together before coating chicken for even flavor distribution
Pat chicken tenders dry before coating to help the sauce adhere better
Space chicken pieces on the baking sheet without overlapping to ensure even cooking and browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does combining BBQ sauce with Asian seasonings and caramel create a unique flavor fusion?
